line.text: %PLAYER%: Incredible. Apocalypse sure was thorough in his attack. This place looks like a war zone.

%PLAYER%: So all we have to do is track down Sebastian Shaw and get him to tell us how to get into Apocalypse's tower. Shaw's cold blooded, ruthless and a bitter enemy of the X-Men. Should be interesting to see what it's gonna take to make him talk.
